name: Western Farm
description:
Arrow keys and Z (QWERTY), W (AZERTY) or A (Xbox 360 gamepad or compatible) to select control scheme, rest is told to you by UI.

Game is saved each winter

Updates:

1.0 (29.6.2017) - Initial release

1.0.1 (30.6.2017) - Removed AZERTY option from web version (Reports that it does not work)

1.0.2 (30.6.2017) - Fixed bug where upgrades were not saved in winter.

1.0.3 (22.6.2018) - All buttons now work as select in the menu (Except S/Y) and updated TIC-80 to 0.60.3
